original_title: Paradise Lost - Live At The Longhorn,Stuttgart
overview: Shown on MTV in 1993.  Setlist : 1.Mortals Watch The Day 2.Embers Fire 3.True Belief 4.Widow 5.Pity The Sadness 6.As I Die 7.Eternal +MTV Headbengers Ball Special Report: 1.Remembrance 2.Gothic 3.As I Die
